title: Ep. 309: Victoria Beckham & Sarah Creal Talking Beauty

description:
Victoria Beckham and Sarah Creal, the co-founders of Victoria Beckham Beauty, chat about their brand, #startuplife, and their take on clean beauty. Also, Victoria opens up about her makeup journey (including those "skinny, skinny eyebrows"), her immutable public image, and her lifelong obsession with beauty products. -- Visit victoriabeckhambeauty.com and use code FATMASCARA at checkout for 10% off; Episode recap & list of products featured: fatmascara.com/blog; To shop the products: myshlf.us/fatmascara; Our private Facebook Group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand; Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit; Email: info@fatmascara.com; To submit a "Raise A Wand" product recommendation & be featured on a future episode: +1 646-481-8182.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
